entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries or rain showers. High 7. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 30 percent chance of flurries early this morning. 30 percent chance of rain showers late this afternoon. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h this morning. High 7. Wind chill minus 7 this morning. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 5:00 AM PDT Saturday 1 April 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of showers. Low minus 10. POP 30%
